plot: Visiting a Hollywood studio theme park, Ben discovers his alien heroes have been ripped off and are starring in a lame network cartoon.

While visiting the Planetary Studios theme park, Ben hopes to meet his favorite live-action TV hero, Kangaroo Commando, but he's both incensed and distracted by illustrator Tim Dean, who has ripped off the likenesses of Wildmutt, Four Arms and Heatblast and passed them off as his own cartoon creations. As a saboteur makes the park unsafe for everyone, Gwen pushes Ben to see past his pre-judgments of these two to help expose who's truly at fault.—statmanjeff
